comments.body: Why are some v1.9 templatized but others not? Can we get notes on the PR or an issue to explain the problem you are solving?

The Header of the document which indicates the release number needs to be templatized. The example/sample output you indicates can still show the test log for 1.9. 
Release version in the header helps the user to identify which version that documents is generated.
ex: Kubernetes Conformance Test Suite - v1.11

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +32,36 @@## [Kubelet-OutputToLogs](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/release-1.9/test/e2e_node/kubelet_test.go#L42)

### Release v1.9
By default the stdout and stderr from the process
being executed in a pod MUST be sent to the pod's logs.
